attributes.action: Immediate tests for COVID-19 for all residents & staff in nursing & care homes.
attributes.additional_details:
Immediately provide testing for all residents and staff of care and nursing homes. It is an incredibly hard decision to move a relative into residential care & these individuals are mothers, fathers, wives, husbands, grandmothers & fathers, sisters and brothers. They are not forgotten - as relatives we care and love them as much, if not more just as if they were living with us. 
The nursing staff & carers are putting themselves at risk by going to work & require testing to ensure they are safe.
attributes.background: Our nursing and care homes are home for our relatives but they have to have people entering and leaving the building in order to provide them with the love & care they all need. They too are self isolating as requested by the Government so they need protection to support their wellbeing.
